Address.label: Address
Address.value: ONE ALBERT QUAY, CORK, T12 X8N6, Ireland

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Johnson Controls manufactures, installs, and services HVAC systems, building management systems and controls, industrial refrigeration systems, and fire and security solutions. Commercial HVAC accounts for about 40% of sales, fire and security represents another 40% of sales, and residential HVAC, industrial refrigeration, and other solutions account for the remaining 20% of revenue. In fiscal 2021, Johnson Controls generated over $23.5 billion in revenue.
